name: Ouch! Potato
description:
You are a potato! Avoid getting cooked by the chef!

Find the keys to escape through the kitchen doors, but make sure to take cover while the chef is looking for his next ingredient!

Team Members

  • Cindy Millenia Hidajat - Dev
  • Katha Villanueva - Dev
  • Martin Su - Dev (Level Designer)
  • Harry Tran - Audio/Music
  • Sonia Tam - Graphics
